name: Barbell Squat
description: A compound exercise that targets the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings. Place the barbell on your upper back, squat down until your thighs are parallel to the floor, and return to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: A chest exercise that works the pectorals, triceps, and anterior deltoids. Lie on a bench, hold dumbbells in each hand, and press them upward.

name: Pull-ups
description: A compound upper body exercise that works the back and biceps. Hang from a pull-up bar and pull your body up until your chin is above the bar.

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: A hamstring and glute exercise. Hold a barbell, hinge at the hips, and lower the barbell toward the floor, keeping your back straight.

name: Overhead Press
description: A shoulder exercise that works the deltoids and triceps. Press a barbell or dumbbells overhead.

name: Treadmill Run
description: A cardio exercise that improves cardiovascular fitness. Run on a treadmill at a desired speed and incline.

name: Leg Press
description: Lower body exercise working quads, glutes, and hamstrings, while seated push the platform away from you.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: An upper body exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi. Pull a bar down to your chest while seated.

name: Plank
description: A core exercise that strengthens the abdominal muscles. Hold a push-up position with your forearms on the ground.

name: Dumbbell Rows
description: An upper body exercise that targets the back and biceps. Row dumbbells towards your torso.

name: Cycling
description: cardio exercise that works many lower body muscles. cycle on a stationary bike.
